info.name: Caw's Simple Spiral
info.description: A simple spiral, easy to build on top of.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ) {
    vec2 c = fragCoord - 0.5*iResolution.xy; //definition of center coordinates [-Res.xy/2 ~ Res.xy/2]
    float ang = atan(c.y,c.x); //angular coordinate [-pi ~ pi]
    float dist = sqrt(c.x*c.x+c.y*c.y); // polar distance coordinate [0 ~ iRes/2]
    float spiral = dist*0.1 + ang - (iTime); // spiral function
    float col = ceil(sin(spiral)); // square wave from spiral function
fragColor = vec4( col-0.5 , 0. , 0. , 1.0); // output: R,G,B,alpha
}
renderpass.name: Image
